name: Space! Dance! And Shooting Stars!
description:
Challenge your friends to a rhythm battle! 

Dash in order to blow up your opponent and gain a point, but be mindful that you can only dash when you're right on beat.

Keep track of the notes as they come down, be mindful of where you dash to next, and make sure to use your parry to defend yourself!

This was made during the 2020 Mix and Jam Game Jam, thank you so much for organizing this :D
